title: Mathieu van der Poel Hints No Tour de France and an MTB Focus for 2025
content:
Will Van der Poel renew his rocky relationship with cross-country? Struggles at the Tour and a vert-packed road worlds are tempting him to shift disciplines.

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel Hints No Tour de France and an MTB Focus for 2025 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
